techs.name: 3D Mapping
techs.description: Software that can visualize large-scale environments in real time, making it visible to machines.
techs.text: Software that can visualize large-scale environments in real time, making it visible to machines.

techs.name: Advertising Software
techs.description: Enables agencies and media companies to easily create video ads that run anywhere and works on any screen as well as automating the process of selling, trafficking and billing digital inventory.
techs.text: Enables agencies and media companies to easily create video ads that run anywhere and works on any screen as well as automating the process of selling, trafficking and billing digital inventory.

techs.name: Anti-Loss Tracker
techs.description: Tiny device that protect valuables of the user when attached by connecting them to their phones. When either a thing or phone is left behind, both will alarm to prevent from losing or misplacing stuff.
techs.text: Tiny device that protect valuables of the user when attached by connecting them to their phones. When either a thing or phone is left behind, both will alarm to prevent from losing or misplacing stuff.

techs.name: API
techs.description: Application programming interface (API) is a set of routines, protocols, and tools for building software applications.
techs.text: Application programming interface (API) is a set of routines, protocols, and tools for building software applications.

techs.name: APM
techs.description: Application Performance Management  (APM) is the monitoring and management of performance and availability of software applications.
techs.text: Application Performance Management  (APM) is the monitoring and management of performance and availability of software applications.

techs.name: Artificial Intelligence
techs.description: A system that perceives its environment and takes actions that maximize its chances of success.
techs.text: A system that perceives its environment and takes actions that maximize its chances of success.

techs.name: Audience Intelligence Platform
techs.description: Provide customer locations, behaviors, social media interactions, and app/software usage.
techs.text: Provide customer locations, behaviors, social media interactions, and app/software usage.

techs.name: Automated Home
techs.description: Part of the Internet of Things trend, it is a house where all the devices and systems talk to each other, coordinating their functions.
techs.text: Part of the Internet of Things trend, it is a house where all the devices and systems talk to each other, coordinating their functions.

techs.name: Automatic Content Recognition
techs.description: Uses audio and video fingerprinting technology to identify content and allow other techs such as social TV, second screen viewing and over-the-top streaming to exist.
techs.text: Uses audio and video fingerprinting technology to identify content and allow other techs such as social TV, second screen viewing and over-the-top streaming to exist.

techs.name: Big Data Intelligence
techs.description: Databases that proactively make decisions and meta-decisions about how to process, capture and store data by analysing it's content.
techs.text: Databases that proactively make decisions and meta-decisions about how to process, capture and store data by analysing it's content.

techs.name: Business Technology Management
techs.description: Group of services intended to help businesses that might not have their own information technology department. Can include technology planning, project management, database services, security, and document services such as e-billing and mass printing.
techs.text: Group of services intended to help businesses that might not have their own information technology department. Can include technology planning, project management, database services, security, and document services such as e-billing and mass printing.

techs.name: Cloud Communications
techs.description: Internet-based voice and data communications where telecommunications applications, switching and storage are hosted by a third-party outside of the organization using them, and they are accessed over the public Internet.
techs.text: Internet-based voice and data communications where telecommunications applications, switching and storage are hosted by a third-party outside of the organization using them, and they are accessed over the public Internet.

techs.name: Cloud Computing
techs.description: Delivery of computing as a service rather than a product, whereby shared resources, software, and information are provided to computers and other devices as a utility over a network.
techs.text: Delivery of computing as a service rather than a product, whereby shared resources, software, and information are provided to computers and other devices as a utility over a network.

techs.name: Cloud Connectivity
techs.description: Allows customers to rapidly integrate cloud and on-premise applications, database and social sources.
techs.text: Allows customers to rapidly integrate cloud and on-premise applications, database and social sources.

techs.name: Cloud Mobile Network
techs.description: Gives operators the ability to offer granular and flexible, user-customizable services. Users may select and change mobile voice, text, and data services, as well as manage devices, plan sharing and permissions, directly from smart devices at any time.
techs.text: Gives operators the ability to offer granular and flexible, user-customizable services. Users may select and change mobile voice, text, and data services, as well as manage devices, plan sharing and permissions, directly from smart devices at any time.

techs.name: Cloud-Based Education
techs.description: Provide access to powerful software and massive computing resources where and when needed and in any way we desired, in order to apply many new educational approaches.
techs.text: Provide access to powerful software and massive computing resources where and when needed and in any way we desired, in order to apply many new educational approaches.

techs.name: Cloudsourcing
techs.description: Involves outsourcing tasks to a distributed group of people and/or AI agents.
techs.text: Involves outsourcing tasks to a distributed group of people and/or AI agents.

techs.name: Community Cellular Network
techs.description: Locally-owned, small-scale, independent cellular networks, run by and for communities.
techs.text: Locally-owned, small-scale, independent cellular networks, run by and for communities.

techs.name: Connected Toys
techs.description: A toy which effectively has its own intelligence by virtue of on-board electronics. These enable it to learn, behave according to pattern, and alter its actions depending upon environmental stimuli. Typically, it can adjust to the abilities of the player.
techs.text: A toy which effectively has its own intelligence by virtue of on-board electronics. These enable it to learn, behave according to pattern, and alter its actions depending upon environmental stimuli. Typically, it can adjust to the abilities of the player.

techs.name: Consumer Robotics
techs.description: Robotic technology products purchased by individual buyers or families and used to educate, entertain, or assist in the home.
techs.text: Robotic technology products purchased by individual buyers or families and used to educate, entertain, or assist in the home.

techs.name: Content Discovery Analytics
techs.description: Increases the accuracy and ease with which end users find relevant, personalized entertainment across multiple channels and devices.
techs.text: Increases the accuracy and ease with which end users find relevant, personalized entertainment across multiple channels and devices.

techs.name: Content Personalization
techs.description: Consumers can get the content they seek and are more likely to enjoy instantly from their smartphone, tablet, and computer -- not just generic answers, but specific, tailored ones.
techs.text: Consumers can get the content they seek and are more likely to enjoy instantly from their smartphone, tablet, and computer -- not just generic answers, but specific, tailored ones.

techs.name: Cosmetic Stickers
techs.description: Stretchable, skin-friendly cosmetic stickers gives control of beauty regimen. They can alert via phone when it’s time to reapply sunscreen and even measure skin’s properties while sleepping to recommending the perfect moisturizer.
techs.text: Stretchable, skin-friendly cosmetic stickers gives control of beauty regimen. They can alert via phone when it’s time to reapply sunscreen and even measure skin’s properties while sleepping to recommending the perfect moisturizer.

techs.name: Cross-Device Content Delivery
techs.description: Assimilates billions of data points to find the human relationship between smartphones, desktops, laptops, tablets, connected TVs and game consoles with the objective of understanding consumer behavior across related screens.
techs.text: Assimilates billions of data points to find the human relationship between smartphones, desktops, laptops, tablets, connected TVs and game consoles with the objective of understanding consumer behavior across related screens.

techs.name: Data Analysis
techs.description: Process of inspecting, cleaning, transforming, and modeling data with the goal of discovering useful information, suggesting conclusions, and supporting decision-making.
techs.text: Process of inspecting, cleaning, transforming, and modeling data with the goal of discovering useful information, suggesting conclusions, and supporting decision-making.

techs.name: Data Streaming
techs.description: Transfer of data at a steady high-speed rate sufficient to support such applications as high-definition television (HDTV) or the continuous backup copying to a storage medium of the data flow within a computer.
techs.text: Transfer of data at a steady high-speed rate sufficient to support such applications as high-definition television (HDTV) or the continuous backup copying to a storage medium of the data flow within a computer.

techs.name: Db for Things
techs.description: Makes it possible to store and analyze the massive streams of time series data generated by connected devices and sensors that break traditional databases.
techs.text: Makes it possible to store and analyze the massive streams of time series data generated by connected devices and sensors that break traditional databases.

techs.name: Digital Content Identification
techs.description: Allows copyright holders to identify and manage their content online.
techs.text: Allows copyright holders to identify and manage their content online.

techs.name: Digital Identity Stamps
techs.description: Small pieces of plastic with secret digital identities that allows mobile applications to interact with real-world objects.
techs.text: Small pieces of plastic with secret digital identities that allows mobile applications to interact with real-world objects.

techs.name: Digital Modulation
techs.description: Is the process of conveying a message signal, for example a digital bit stream or an analog audio signal, inside another signal that can be physically transmitted. Modulation of a sine waveform transforms a baseband message signal into a passband signal.
techs.text: Is the process of conveying a message signal, for example a digital bit stream or an analog audio signal, inside another signal that can be physically transmitted. Modulation of a sine waveform transforms a baseband message signal into a passband signal.

techs.name: Digital Transaction Management
techs.description: Category of software designed to safely and securely manage document-based transactions digitally. DTM removes friction inherent in processes that involve people, documents, and data inside and beyond the firewall to create faster, easier, more convenient and secure transactions.
techs.text: Category of software designed to safely and securely manage document-based transactions digitally. DTM removes friction inherent in processes that involve people, documents, and data inside and beyond the firewall to create faster, easier, more convenient and secure transactions.

techs.name: Driving Assistant
techs.description: Gathers and reviews data in order to discover ways to make better decisions about driving habits.
techs.text: Gathers and reviews data in order to discover ways to make better decisions about driving habits.

techs.name: Drug Data
techs.description: Provides better information about medications such as side effects and results by gathering data from medical experts and patients.
techs.text: Provides better information about medications such as side effects and results by gathering data from medical experts and patients.

techs.name: E-Textiles
techs.description: Fabrics that enable digital components and electronics to be embedded in them. Electronic textiles are distinct from wearable computing because emphasis is placed on the seamless integration of textiles with electronic elements like microcontrollers, sensors, and actuators. Furthermore, e-textiles need not be wearable such as those found in interior design.
techs.text: Fabrics that enable digital components and electronics to be embedded in them. Electronic textiles are distinct from wearable computing because emphasis is placed on the seamless integration of textiles with electronic elements like microcontrollers, sensors, and actuators. Furthermore, e-textiles need not be wearable such as those found in interior design.

techs.name: Edge Application Controller
techs.description: Platform with power and scalability for core networks, and fine perspective of access networks, that manages live traffic astride both areas with full-stack intelligence, enhancing reliability and speed of the network.
techs.text: Platform with power and scalability for core networks, and fine perspective of access networks, that manages live traffic astride both areas with full-stack intelligence, enhancing reliability and speed of the network.

techs.name: Ethernet
techs.description: Ethernet is a family of computer networking technologies for local area (LAN) and larger networks.
techs.text: Ethernet is a family of computer networking technologies for local area (LAN) and larger networks.

techs.name: Fantasy Sports
techs.description: Game where participants act as owners to build a team that competes against other fantasy owners based on the statistics generated by the real individual players or teams of a professional sport also see daily fantasy sports.
techs.text: Game where participants act as owners to build a team that competes against other fantasy owners based on the statistics generated by the real individual players or teams of a professional sport also see daily fantasy sports.

techs.name: First-Generation Smart Grid
techs.description: Electrical meters that record consumption of electric energy in real time while communicating the information back to the utility for monitoring and billing purposes. Can be used for remote load-balancing such as disabling non-essential devices at peak usage.
techs.text: Electrical meters that record consumption of electric energy in real time while communicating the information back to the utility for monitoring and billing purposes. Can be used for remote load-balancing such as disabling non-essential devices at peak usage.

techs.name: Fitness Tracker
techs.description: Monitors and tracks fitness-related metrics such as distance walked or run, calorie consumption, and in some cases heartbeat and quality of sleep.
techs.text: Monitors and tracks fitness-related metrics such as distance walked or run, calorie consumption, and in some cases heartbeat and quality of sleep.

techs.name: Game-Based Learning
techs.description: Game play that has defined learning outcomes. Generally, it's designed to balance subject matter with gameplay and the ability of the player to retain and apply said subject matter to the real world.
techs.text: Game play that has defined learning outcomes. Generally, it's designed to balance subject matter with gameplay and the ability of the player to retain and apply said subject matter to the real world.

techs.name: Gamification
techs.description: Gamification uses an empathy-based approach in non-game contexts to engage users in solving problems.
techs.text: Gamification uses an empathy-based approach in non-game contexts to engage users in solving problems.

techs.name: Geospatial Intelligence
techs.description: Intelligence about the human activity on earth derived from the exploitation and analysis of imagery and geospatial information that describes, assesses, and visually depicts physical features and geographically referenced activities on the Earth.
techs.text: Intelligence about the human activity on earth derived from the exploitation and analysis of imagery and geospatial information that describes, assesses, and visually depicts physical features and geographically referenced activities on the Earth.

techs.name: Geotargeted Advertising
techs.description: Use location as primary signal in targeting and optimization for our customers.
techs.text: Use location as primary signal in targeting and optimization for our customers.

techs.name: Hyperscale Networking
techs.description: Hyperscale Networking refers to the facilities and provisioning required in distributed computing environments to efficiently scale from a few servers to thousands of servers. Is usually used in environments such as big data and cloud computing
techs.text: Hyperscale Networking refers to the facilities and provisioning required in distributed computing environments to efficiently scale from a few servers to thousands of servers. Is usually used in environments such as big data and cloud computing

techs.name: Infinite Usb Memory Drive
techs.description: Looks like a conventional flash memory drive but it's actually a Wi-Fi adapter that presents itself as a flash drive to the devices you plug it into. By linking the IUM to a Wi-Fi-equipped host computer, you can share anything on that computer and have it appear as if it were stored locally on the IUM--hence, infinite storage.
techs.text: Looks like a conventional flash memory drive but it's actually a Wi-Fi adapter that presents itself as a flash drive to the devices you plug it into. By linking the IUM to a Wi-Fi-equipped host computer, you can share anything on that computer and have it appear as if it were stored locally on the IUM--hence, infinite storage.

techs.name: Ingestible Sensors
techs.description: Digital devices with tiny sensors that you swallow for gathering and storing data, transmitting body temperature, heart and respiration rate to an external device.
techs.text: Digital devices with tiny sensors that you swallow for gathering and storing data, transmitting body temperature, heart and respiration rate to an external device.

techs.name: Integrated Media Processing
techs.description: Enables video service providers to meet the massive demand for video on any screen.
techs.text: Enables video service providers to meet the massive demand for video on any screen.

techs.name: Intellectual Property Management
techs.description: Helps content creators and brands grow online audiences and monetize content.
techs.text: Helps content creators and brands grow online audiences and monetize content.

techs.name: Smart Doorbell
techs.description: Doorbells that, by using mechanisms such as facial recognition and bluetooth of a smartphone, unlock doors without the need of keys.
techs.text: Doorbells that, by using mechanisms such as facial recognition and bluetooth of a smartphone, unlock doors without the need of keys.

techs.name: Interactive Books
techs.description: Interactive books for mobile or tablets with swipeable video and graphics, games and data visualizations in order to increase content absorption
techs.text: Interactive books for mobile or tablets with swipeable video and graphics, games and data visualizations in order to increase content absorption

techs.name: IT Planning
techs.description: Information Technology Planning is concerned with making the planning process for IT investments and decision-making a quicker, more flexible, and more thoroughly aligned process
techs.text: Information Technology Planning is concerned with making the planning process for IT investments and decision-making a quicker, more flexible, and more thoroughly aligned process

techs.name: Learning Analytics
techs.description: Combines tracking with student interaction in online education tools, aiming to create a more integrated and customized learning experience.
techs.text: Combines tracking with student interaction in online education tools, aiming to create a more integrated and customized learning experience.

techs.name: Li-Fi
techs.description: Bidirectional, high speed and fully networked wireless communications, like Wi-Fi, using lightwaves.
techs.text: Bidirectional, high speed and fully networked wireless communications, like Wi-Fi, using lightwaves.

techs.name: Live Mobile Video
techs.description: Bidirectional, high speed and fully networked wireless communications, like Wi-Fi, using lightwaves.
techs.text: Bidirectional, high speed and fully networked wireless communications, like Wi-Fi, using lightwaves.

techs.name: lifecasting
techs.description: Devices that allows continual broadcast of events in a person's life through digital media. Typically, lifecasting is transmitted through the medium of the Internet and can involve wearable technology
techs.text: Devices that allows continual broadcast of events in a person's life through digital media. Typically, lifecasting is transmitted through the medium of the Internet and can involve wearable technology

techs.name: Location Intelligence
techs.description: Organize and understand complex phenomena through the use of geographical relationships inherent in all information.
techs.text: Organize and understand complex phenomena through the use of geographical relationships inherent in all information.

techs.name: Low-Latency Networks
techs.description: For high frequency trading and other high-speed transactional applications, a millisecond delay can cost millions. To serve today’s financial and other latency-sensitive enterprise applications, service providers must be able to deliver network connectivity with super-low latency and rock-solid availability.
techs.text: For high frequency trading and other high-speed transactional applications, a millisecond delay can cost millions. To serve today’s financial and other latency-sensitive enterprise applications, service providers must be able to deliver network connectivity with super-low latency and rock-solid availability.

techs.name: MBAAS
techs.description: Mobile Backend as a service is a model for providing web and mobile app developers with a way to link their applications to backend cloud storage and APIs exposed by back end applications while also providing features such as user management, push notifications, and integration with social networking services.
techs.text: Mobile Backend as a service is a model for providing web and mobile app developers with a way to link their applications to backend cloud storage and APIs exposed by back end applications while also providing features such as user management, push notifications, and integration with social networking services.

techs.name: Metamaterials Surface Antenna
techs.description: More efficient and compact alternative to conventional satellite antennas.
techs.text: More efficient and compact alternative to conventional satellite antennas.

techs.name: Mobile Analytics
techs.description: Provides a deeper understanding of your mobile app users and a comprehensive view into your mobile campaign performance.
techs.text: Provides a deeper understanding of your mobile app users and a comprehensive view into your mobile campaign performance.

techs.name: Mobile Bandwidth on Demand
techs.description: A cloud-based bandwidth marketplace that varies the wifi price in real time according to offer and demand.
techs.text: A cloud-based bandwidth marketplace that varies the wifi price in real time according to offer and demand.

techs.name: Mobile Payments
techs.description: Instead of paying with cash, cheque, or credit cards, a consumer can use a mobile phone to pay for a wide range of services and digital or hard goods.
techs.text: Instead of paying with cash, cheque, or credit cards, a consumer can use a mobile phone to pay for a wide range of services and digital or hard goods.

techs.name: Moisture Detection
techs.description: Detects and alerts about water leaks as well as important changes in humidity and temperature.
techs.text: Detects and alerts about water leaks as well as important changes in humidity and temperature.

techs.name: Natural Language Processing
techs.description: Field of computer science, artificial intelligence, and linguistics concerned with the interactions between computers and human natural languages.
techs.text: Field of computer science, artificial intelligence, and linguistics concerned with the interactions between computers and human natural languages.

techs.name: next-gen mobile network
techs.description: Mobile network solutions that completely revolutionize mobile networks and mobile subscriber and content management functions.
techs.text: Mobile network solutions that completely revolutionize mobile networks and mobile subscriber and content management functions.

techs.name: Network Security Software
techs.description: Provisions and policies that prevent and monitor unauthorized access, misuse, modification, or denial of a computer network and network-accessible resources.
techs.text: Provisions and policies that prevent and monitor unauthorized access, misuse, modification, or denial of a computer network and network-accessible resources.

techs.name: Network Virtualization
techs.description: Process of combining hardware and software network resources and network functionality into a single, software-based administrative entity, a virtual network.
techs.text: Process of combining hardware and software network resources and network functionality into a single, software-based administrative entity, a virtual network.

techs.name: Next-Gen Video Encoder
techs.description: Shrinks video by 40 to 45 percent compared to today's prevailing H.264.
techs.text: Shrinks video by 40 to 45 percent compared to today's prevailing H.264.

techs.name: Next Generation Video File Compression
techs.description: Compress video streams (at high quality) using advanced mathematical algorithms. This reduces congestion by allowing much smaller files to be transmitted.
techs.text: Compress video streams (at high quality) using advanced mathematical algorithms. This reduces congestion by allowing much smaller files to be transmitted.

techs.name: On-demand TV
techs.description: Allows users to select and watch/listen to video or audio content when they choose to, rather than having to watch at a specific broadcast time.
techs.text: Allows users to select and watch/listen to video or audio content when they choose to, rather than having to watch at a specific broadcast time.

techs.name: Open Health Records
techs.description: Designed to represent data that accurately captures the state of the patient at all times. It allows for an entire patient history to be viewed ensuring data is accurate, appropriate and legible.
techs.text: Designed to represent data that accurately captures the state of the patient at all times. It allows for an entire patient history to be viewed ensuring data is accurate, appropriate and legible.

techs.name: Open-source Operating System
techs.description: Colaborative development of a software that manages computer hardware and software resources and provides common services for computer programs.
techs.text: Colaborative development of a software that manages computer hardware and software resources and provides common services for computer programs.

techs.name: Operational Intelligence
techs.description: Delivers visibility and insight into data, streaming events and business operations. It provides organizations the ability to make decisions and immediately act on these analytic insights, through manual or automated actions.
techs.text: Delivers visibility and insight into data, streaming events and business operations. It provides organizations the ability to make decisions and immediately act on these analytic insights, through manual or automated actions.

techs.name: Over-The-Top Video
techs.description: Refers to delivery of audio, video, and other media over the Internet without the involvement of a multiple-system operator in the control or distribution of the content.
techs.text: Refers to delivery of audio, video, and other media over the Internet without the involvement of a multiple-system operator in the control or distribution of the content.

techs.name: Peer-To-Peer File Synchronization
techs.description: Sync files between devices on a local network, or between remote devices over the Internet via secure, distributed P2P technology.
techs.text: Sync files between devices on a local network, or between remote devices over the Internet via secure, distributed P2P technology.

techs.name: Personalized Medicine
techs.description: The application of panomic analysis and systems biology to analyze the cause of an individual patient's disease at the molecular level and then to utilize targeted treatments (possibly in combination) to address that individual patient's disease process.
techs.text: The application of panomic analysis and systems biology to analyze the cause of an individual patient's disease at the molecular level and then to utilize targeted treatments (possibly in combination) to address that individual patient's disease process.

techs.name: Pocket TV
techs.description: Give consumers access to local and regional live TV channels as well as online streaming services, games, media sharing, mirroring from a phone or tablet and the ability to install and run to over one million Android apps.
techs.text: Give consumers access to local and regional live TV channels as well as online streaming services, games, media sharing, mirroring from a phone or tablet and the ability to install and run to over one million Android apps.

techs.name: Portable Medical Diagnostic
techs.description: App that lets users remotely consult with physicians to diagnose their ailments.
techs.text: App that lets users remotely consult with physicians to diagnose their ailments.

techs.name: Private Cloud
techs.description: Cloud computing platform that is implemented within the corporate firewall, under the control of the IT department.
techs.text: Cloud computing platform that is implemented within the corporate firewall, under the control of the IT department.

techs.name: Proactive Software Agents
techs.description: Software applications with the capacity of discerning and predicting likely future needs for whomever is being served. Intelligently scheduling meetings, sorting email and selectively notifying the user are potential usages.
techs.text: Software applications with the capacity of discerning and predicting likely future needs for whomever is being served. Intelligently scheduling meetings, sorting email and selectively notifying the user are potential usages.

techs.name: Quantified Self
techs.description: Movement to incorporate technology into data acquisition on daily life in terms of inputs (e.g. food consumed), states (e.g. mood), and performance (mental and physical). With the coming changes in the amount and diversity of datasets, data-centric approaches that compute on massive amounts of data to discover patterns and to make clinically relevant predictions would be increasingly common in translational bioinformatics.
techs.text: Movement to incorporate technology into data acquisition on daily life in terms of inputs (e.g. food consumed), states (e.g. mood), and performance (mental and physical). With the coming changes in the amount and diversity of datasets, data-centric approaches that compute on massive amounts of data to discover patterns and to make clinically relevant predictions would be increasingly common in translational bioinformatics.

techs.name: Real-Time Polymorphism
techs.description: Advanced security defense that allows to protect the user interface layer of your website — where HTML, CSS, and JavaScript are transmitted — comprehensively and transparently, in a way that deflects attacks while not introducing friction for real users.
techs.text: Advanced security defense that allows to protect the user interface layer of your website — where HTML, CSS, and JavaScript are transmitted — comprehensively and transparently, in a way that deflects attacks while not introducing friction for real users.

techs.name: Remote Health Management
techs.description: Enable monitoring of patients outside of conventional clinical settings, which may increase access to care and decrease healthcare delivery costs.
techs.text: Enable monitoring of patients outside of conventional clinical settings, which may increase access to care and decrease healthcare delivery costs.

techs.name: Second Screen
techs.description: Use of a device (commonly a mobile device, such as a tablet or smartphone) to provide an enhanced viewing experience for content on another device, such as a television.
techs.text: Use of a device (commonly a mobile device, such as a tablet or smartphone) to provide an enhanced viewing experience for content on another device, such as a television.

techs.name: Secure Apps
techs.description: Add new security policies to existing mobile apps with a point-and-click interface.
techs.text: Add new security policies to existing mobile apps with a point-and-click interface.

techs.name: Sensor Analytics
techs.description: Has the potential bring insight to all that data from sensors on factory tools, airplanes, smart grids and fitness devices.
techs.text: Has the potential bring insight to all that data from sensors on factory tools, airplanes, smart grids and fitness devices.

techs.name: Shared Broadband
techs.description: Technologies that allow all of the phones or routers in a carrier’s network to link up with another and crowdsource their connections.
techs.text: Technologies that allow all of the phones or routers in a carrier’s network to link up with another and crowdsource their connections.

techs.name: Sharing Economy
techs.description: An economic model geared toward developing access (not ownership), where consumers lend, swap, barter, share and gift products.
techs.text: An economic model geared toward developing access (not ownership), where consumers lend, swap, barter, share and gift products.

techs.name: Shopping-Enabled Entertainment
techs.description: Allows viewers to engage with and transact directly from advertisements and television shows through web, mobile, and advanced television applications.
techs.text: Allows viewers to engage with and transact directly from advertisements and television shows through web, mobile, and advanced television applications.

techs.name: SIEM
techs.description: Security information and event management (SIEM) is a term for software products and services combining security information management(SIM) and security event management (SEM). SIEM technology provides real-time analysis of security alerts generated by network hardware and applications. SIEM is sold as software, appliances or managed services, and are also used to log security data and generate reports for compliance purposes
techs.text: Security information and event management (SIEM) is a term for software products and services combining security information management(SIM) and security event management (SEM). SIEM technology provides real-time analysis of security alerts generated by network hardware and applications. SIEM is sold as software, appliances or managed services, and are also used to log security data and generate reports for compliance purposes

techs.name: Single Sign-On
techs.description: Single sign-on allows a user to log in once and gain access to multiple software systems at once. This reduces the fatigue, time spent and support needed from managing different username and password combinations, and could turn into an universal protocol that relinquishes passwords or pins.
techs.text: Single sign-on allows a user to log in once and gain access to multiple software systems at once. This reduces the fatigue, time spent and support needed from managing different username and password combinations, and could turn into an universal protocol that relinquishes passwords or pins.

techs.name: Small Cell Network
techs.description: Platforms that allow mobile operators to deliver cellular and Wi-Fi coverage, capacity and smart applications to enterprises of any size. They provide flexibility, increased QoS capabilities at an attractive cost and are also more environmentally friendly as it will reduce the number of cell towers.
techs.text: Platforms that allow mobile operators to deliver cellular and Wi-Fi coverage, capacity and smart applications to enterprises of any size. They provide flexibility, increased QoS capabilities at an attractive cost and are also more environmentally friendly as it will reduce the number of cell towers.

techs.name: Smart Control
techs.description: Allow users to search, discover, explore, and access what’s on live TV, and on-demand movies and TV shows - across multiple video-on-demand providers.
techs.text: Allow users to search, discover, explore, and access what’s on live TV, and on-demand movies and TV shows - across multiple video-on-demand providers.

techs.name: Smart Home Security
techs.description: Adapts to the house over time and sends intelligent notifications with HD video directly to your smartphone.
techs.text: Adapts to the house over time and sends intelligent notifications with HD video directly to your smartphone.

techs.name: Smart Leds
techs.description: Wifi enabled, multi-color, energy efficient LED light bulb that you can control with your smartphone.
techs.text: Wifi enabled, multi-color, energy efficient LED light bulb that you can control with your smartphone.

techs.name: Smart Lighting
techs.description: Designed to improve energy efficiency. This may include high efficiency fixtures and automated controls that make adjustments based on conditions such as occupancy or daylight availability.
techs.text: Designed to improve energy efficiency. This may include high efficiency fixtures and automated controls that make adjustments based on conditions such as occupancy or daylight availability.

techs.name: Smart Smoke Alarm
techs.description: Sends app notifications and calls your phone when smoke or carbon monoxide alarms sound.
techs.text: Sends app notifications and calls your phone when smoke or carbon monoxide alarms sound.

techs.name: Social Healthcare
techs.description: A variety of tools that connect health care professionals and boosts hospital efficiency, saves time and improves care transition. Some examples of this trend includes online scheduling, virtual medical consultations and messaging platforms between professionals.
techs.text: A variety of tools that connect health care professionals and boosts hospital efficiency, saves time and improves care transition. Some examples of this trend includes online scheduling, virtual medical consultations and messaging platforms between professionals.

techs.name: Social Media Analytics
techs.description: Gathers data from blogs and social media websites and analyzes it to make business decisions. The most common use of social media analytics is to mine customer sentiment.
techs.text: Gathers data from blogs and social media websites and analyzes it to make business decisions. The most common use of social media analytics is to mine customer sentiment.

techs.name: Social Video Discovery
techs.description: Turns the internet into a tv by allowing users to watch their favorite websites as they were channels
techs.text: Turns the internet into a tv by allowing users to watch their favorite websites as they were channels

techs.name: Social Video Indexing Platform
techs.description: Enables deep indexing of video content and recognize objects, people and actions in video footage.
techs.text: Enables deep indexing of video content and recognize objects, people and actions in video footage.

techs.name: Social Workflow
techs.description: Social communication tools are being baked into business processes to provide more fluid workflows and enable data gathering to make better business decisions. Using the popular form factor of social networks and user-friendly graphic interfaces, these platforms help remove obstacles around effective use.
techs.text: Social communication tools are being baked into business processes to provide more fluid workflows and enable data gathering to make better business decisions. Using the popular form factor of social networks and user-friendly graphic interfaces, these platforms help remove obstacles around effective use.

techs.name: Software Analytics
techs.description: Real-time insight from applications—how they're being used, how they're performing, where they need help.
techs.text: Real-time insight from applications—how they're being used, how they're performing, where they need help.

techs.name: Software As a Service
techs.description: A software licensing and delivery model in which software is licensed on a subscription basis and is centrally hosted.
techs.text: A software licensing and delivery model in which software is licensed on a subscription basis and is centrally hosted.

techs.name: Storage Intelligence
techs.description: Actively collect, consolidate, analyze and present critical information about the success data storage operations. Allows a more reliable and efficient evaluation on how well backup procedures and data storage operations are complying with enterprise policies.
techs.text: Actively collect, consolidate, analyze and present critical information about the success data storage operations. Allows a more reliable and efficient evaluation on how well backup procedures and data storage operations are complying with enterprise policies.

techs.name: Symptom-Tracking Analytics
techs.description: A software that helps patients understand connections between symptoms and factors like diet and medication.
techs.text: A software that helps patients understand connections between symptoms and factors like diet and medication.

techs.name: Task Automation
techs.description: Automation service for small tasks between Internet-connected services.
techs.text: Automation service for small tasks between Internet-connected services.

techs.name: Telepresence
techs.description: Allows a person to feel, give the appearance or to have an effect of being present at a place other than their true location.
techs.text: Allows a person to feel, give the appearance or to have an effect of being present at a place other than their true location.

techs.name: Telepresence Robots
techs.description: A remote-controlled, wheeled device with a display to enable video chat and videoconferencing, among other purposes.
techs.text: A remote-controlled, wheeled device with a display to enable video chat and videoconferencing, among other purposes.

techs.name: Temporary Social Media
techs.description: Messages that quickly self-destruct could enhance the privacy of online communication and make people feel freer to be spontaneous.
techs.text: Messages that quickly self-destruct could enhance the privacy of online communication and make people feel freer to be spontaneous.

techs.name: Tv's Search Application
techs.description: Platform that captures every word spoken on television, processing the data in real-time, to create a new discovery layer for live TV.
techs.text: Platform that captures every word spoken on television, processing the data in real-time, to create a new discovery layer for live TV.

techs.name: Unified Identity Management
techs.description: Lets you centrally manage identities across data center, cloud and mobile to optimize cost, agility and security.
techs.text: Lets you centrally manage identities across data center, cloud and mobile to optimize cost, agility and security.

techs.name: Annotated-reality glasses
techs.description: Like Google Glass, these technologies add a layer of information on top of reality without replacing the underlying objects. Not to be confused with Agumented Reality, which is able to simulate virtual objects for the user.
techs.text: Like Google Glass, these technologies add a layer of information on top of reality without replacing the underlying objects. Not to be confused with Agumented Reality, which is able to simulate virtual objects for the user.

techs.name: Video Monetization Platform
techs.description: Monetizes videos with more targeted, measurable, and interactive TV commercials.
techs.text: Monetizes videos with more targeted, measurable, and interactive TV commercials.

techs.name: Virtual Reality Accessories
techs.description: Now that VR headsets are starting to make their appearance, the need for accessories and peripherals is greater than ever. They allow users to feel by walking, smelling, touching, etc the simulation.
techs.text: Now that VR headsets are starting to make their appearance, the need for accessories and peripherals is greater than ever. They allow users to feel by walking, smelling, touching, etc the simulation.

techs.name: Virtual Reality Headset
techs.description: High-quality virtual-reality hardware that is cheap enough for the consumer market. Visually immersive interfaces will lead to new forms of entertainment and communications. Combined with accessories and technologies such as eye-tracking and haptic gloves are creating an even more immersive experience.
techs.text: High-quality virtual-reality hardware that is cheap enough for the consumer market. Visually immersive interfaces will lead to new forms of entertainment and communications. Combined with accessories and technologies such as eye-tracking and haptic gloves are creating an even more immersive experience.

techs.name: Virtual Study Rooms
techs.description: Communities around online classes where students can meet fellow classmates and work together.
techs.text: Communities around online classes where students can meet fellow classmates and work together.

techs.name: Voice Controlled Wearables
techs.description: Makes devices extremely useful for workers in restaurants, factories or supermarket chains or in any situation where a person can't be distracted by having to look at a phone screen.
techs.text: Makes devices extremely useful for workers in restaurants, factories or supermarket chains or in any situation where a person can't be distracted by having to look at a phone screen.

techs.name: Wearable Camera
techs.description: Small, wearable, hands-free and fully automatic camera.
techs.text: Small, wearable, hands-free and fully automatic camera.

techs.name: Web API
techs.description: Application programming interface for both the web server and web browser. It gathers definitions, procedures and protocols to help the communication between different computer softwares.
techs.text: Application programming interface for both the web server and web browser. It gathers definitions, procedures and protocols to help the communication between different computer softwares.

techs.name: Wi-Fi Enabled Modules
techs.description: Wi-Fi development board that is the size of a matchbox used for building connected devices.
techs.text: Wi-Fi development board that is the size of a matchbox used for building connected devices.

techs.name: Wi-Fi Manager
techs.description: Runs in existing wifi routers and adds the power and accessibility of the cloud to home network by managing the devices connected to the network.
techs.text: Runs in existing wifi routers and adds the power and accessibility of the cloud to home network by managing the devices connected to the network.

techs.name: Wi-Fi for Things
techs.description: Regular mobile networks are jammed with traffic from phone calls and people downloading videos. But for the Internet of things to become a reality, similar capabilities will need to be extended to billions of objects witg a wireless slow lane for small, low-power devices.
techs.text: Regular mobile networks are jammed with traffic from phone calls and people downloading videos. But for the Internet of things to become a reality, similar capabilities will need to be extended to billions of objects witg a wireless slow lane for small, low-power devices.

techs.name: Wireless Charging
techs.description: It senses where your devices are and fires a magnetic field in their direction to keep them charged up. No plugging in required, ever.
techs.text: It senses where your devices are and fires a magnetic field in their direction to keep them charged up. No plugging in required, ever.

techs.name: Wireless Full Duplex
techs.description: Allows a radio to simultaneously transmit and receive overlapping signals using a single frequency channel. Enable wireless full duplex, doubling the spectral efficiency of every radio in the world (an economic value of trillions of dollars) and also simplifies spectrum management: currently an complex task in the hand of regulators.
techs.text: Allows a radio to simultaneously transmit and receive overlapping signals using a single frequency channel. Enable wireless full duplex, doubling the spectral efficiency of every radio in the world (an economic value of trillions of dollars) and also simplifies spectrum management: currently an complex task in the hand of regulators.

techs.name: Real-time location
techs.description: Combines highly accurate and fresh maps with cloud technology that enables rich, real-time location experiences in a broad range of connected devices - from smartphones and tablets to wearables and vehicles
techs.text: Combines highly accurate and fresh maps with cloud technology that enables rich, real-time location experiences in a broad range of connected devices - from smartphones and tablets to wearables and vehicles

techs.name: next-gen M2M communications
techs.description: Connects and enables an array of equipment from mainframes to everyday products (e.g., home appliances, vehicles, buildings) in order to unleash new levels of smart services and commerce.
techs.text: Connects and enables an array of equipment from mainframes to everyday products (e.g., home appliances, vehicles, buildings) in order to unleash new levels of smart services and commerce.

techs.name: foot traffic sensors
techs.description: Intelligent floor mat that captures insights on movement and behavior.
techs.text: Intelligent floor mat that captures insights on movement and behavior.

techs.name: sensor analytics
techs.description: Has the potential bring insight to all that data from sensors on factory tools, airplanes, smart grids and fitness devices.
techs.text: Has the potential bring insight to all that data from sensors on factory tools, airplanes, smart grids and fitness devices.

techs.name: Social Workflow
techs.description: Social communication tools are being baked into business processes to provide more fluid workflows and enable data gathering to make better business decisions. Using the popular form factor of social networks and user-friendly graphic interfaces, these platforms help remove obstacles around effective use.
techs.text: Social communication tools are being baked into business processes to provide more fluid workflows and enable data gathering to make better business decisions. Using the popular form factor of social networks and user-friendly graphic interfaces, these platforms help remove obstacles around effective use.

techs.name: Mobile Games
techs.description: Video game played on a feature phone, smartphones, PDA, tablet computer, etc.
techs.text: Video game played on a feature phone, smartphones, PDA, tablet computer, etc.

techs.name: Smart Pill Bottles
techs.description: Tracks and improves adherence in real-time. It's currently being used by patients in engagements with pharmaceutical companies and research institutions.
techs.text: Tracks and improves adherence in real-time. It's currently being used by patients in engagements with pharmaceutical companies and research institutions.

techs.name: Online Live TV
techs.description: Allows users to watch live TV directly through any device connected on the Internet
techs.text: Allows users to watch live TV directly through any device connected on the Internet

techs.name: precision cooker devices
techs.description: Provide precise temperature and humidity control to cook meals more accurately.
techs.text: Provide precise temperature and humidity control to cook meals more accurately.

techs.name: Automated Quote-To-Cash
techs.description: Helps manage contracts from the time a buyer expresses interest in a product to the actual collection of revenues from the sale. It's designed to run within a Salesforce instance so the pricing, products, quotes and sales contracts can be synced.
techs.text: Helps manage contracts from the time a buyer expresses interest in a product to the actual collection of revenues from the sale. It's designed to run within a Salesforce instance so the pricing, products, quotes and sales contracts can be synced.

techs.name: Smart Home Hubs
techs.description: Powered with Wi-Fi connectivity and environment sensors (e.i. temperature, humidity and light) these devices are able to recognize commands, using searching engines to elaborate the possible answers. Connectivity allows to integrate with other devices, for instance a Nest thermostat, in order to respond to commands like “turn up the heat”.
techs.text: Powered with Wi-Fi connectivity and environment sensors (e.i. temperature, humidity and light) these devices are able to recognize commands, using searching engines to elaborate the possible answers. Connectivity allows to integrate with other devices, for instance a Nest thermostat, in order to respond to commands like “turn up the heat”.

techs.name: mobile live video transmission
techs.description: Broadcast quality video over cellular technology for live transmission in standard definition and high definition globally.
techs.text: Broadcast quality video over cellular technology for live transmission in standard definition and high definition globally.

techs.name: Low power batteries
techs.description: Dramatically reduces the amount of power consumed by semiconductors thus making our integrated circuits an ideal solution for energy critical applications.
techs.text: Dramatically reduces the amount of power consumed by semiconductors thus making our integrated circuits an ideal solution for energy critical applications.

techs.name: Social Online Games
techs.description: Online games played on a social media platform.
techs.text: Online games played on a social media platform.

techs.name: Telehealth
techs.description: Health-related services and information via telecommunications technologies. Can be as simple as two health professionals discussing a case over the telephone or as sophisticated as doing robotic surgery between facilities at different ends of the globe.
techs.text: Health-related services and information via telecommunications technologies. Can be as simple as two health professionals discussing a case over the telephone or as sophisticated as doing robotic surgery between facilities at different ends of the globe.

techs.name: digital health marketplace
techs.description: Data driven rating system that evaluates heath care providers in order to help patients to choose the right doctor for them.
techs.text: Data driven rating system that evaluates heath care providers in order to help patients to choose the right doctor for them.

techs.name: online video/audio platform
techs.description: Enables users to upload, convert, store and play back video/audio content on the Internet, often via a structured, scalable solution that can be monetized.
techs.text: Enables users to upload, convert, store and play back video/audio content on the Internet, often via a structured, scalable solution that can be monetized.

techs.name: M2M Network
techs.description: Allow both wireless and wired systems to communicate with other devices of the same type
techs.text: Allow both wireless and wired systems to communicate with other devices of the same type

techs.name: Cloud storage
techs.description: Digital data is stored in logical pools, the physical storage spans multiple servers (and often locations), and the physical environment is typically owned and managed by a hosting company.
techs.text: Digital data is stored in logical pools, the physical storage spans multiple servers (and often locations), and the physical environment is typically owned and managed by a hosting company.

techs.name: Smart Thermostats
techs.description: Allows the user to control the temperature of their home throughout the day using a schedule, such as setting a lower temperature at night. As they are connected to the Internet, they allow users to adjust heating settings from other internet-connected devices, such as smartphones.
techs.text: Allows the user to control the temperature of their home throughout the day using a schedule, such as setting a lower temperature at night. As they are connected to the Internet, they allow users to adjust heating settings from other internet-connected devices, such as smartphones.

techs.name: Biofeedback clothing
techs.description: Clothes that respond by integrating technology into apparel to make everything that goes on your body smarter.
techs.text: Clothes that respond by integrating technology into apparel to make everything that goes on your body smarter.

techs.name: Autonomous cars
techs.description: Vehicles capable of sensing its environment and navigating on their own.
techs.text: Vehicles capable of sensing its environment and navigating on their own.

techs.name: Clinical Intelligence
techs.description: Knowledge derived when data of the clinical process is queried, analyzed and understood.
techs.text: Knowledge derived when data of the clinical process is queried, analyzed and understood.

techs.name: Adaptable personalization
techs.description: Contextual services that learn shopper preferences over time, generating tailored results and anticipating future needs.
techs.text: Contextual services that learn shopper preferences over time, generating tailored results and anticipating future needs.

techs.name: IT Automation
techs.description: Links disparate systems and software in such a way that they become self-acting or self-regulating
techs.text: Links disparate systems and software in such a way that they become self-acting or self-regulating

techs.name: Next-gen flash storage
techs.description: More affordable flash storage that permits organizations to keep large amounts of data.
techs.text: More affordable flash storage that permits organizations to keep large amounts of data.

techs.name: Next-gen Wifi
techs.description: Technologies that allow predictable performance, rock-solid reliability, and easy service deployment wifi networks in order to support whole-home, full HD video distribution and networking services over standard Wi-Fi networks.
techs.text: Technologies that allow predictable performance, rock-solid reliability, and easy service deployment wifi networks in order to support whole-home, full HD video distribution and networking services over standard Wi-Fi networks.

techs.name: open cache
techs.description: Identifies data that's frequently sent in network traffic, caches it locally, and delivers it from the network edge when requested – without requiring any change of behavior or business logic by content providers, CDNs, or subscribers.
techs.text: Identifies data that's frequently sent in network traffic, caches it locally, and delivers it from the network edge when requested – without requiring any change of behavior or business logic by content providers, CDNs, or subscribers.

techs.name: app-ware networking
techs.description: Maintains current information about applications that connect to a intelligent network and, as a result, optimize their functioning as well as that of other applications or systems that they control.
techs.text: Maintains current information about applications that connect to a intelligent network and, as a result, optimize their functioning as well as that of other applications or systems that they control.

techs.name: Molecular sensor
techs.description: Tiny spectrometer that allows to get instant relevant information about the chemical make-up of materials or physical objects.
techs.text: Tiny spectrometer that allows to get instant relevant information about the chemical make-up of materials or physical objects.
